posts.body:
>>85f8d061-8bc1-4a82-91e4-bce92040474a
Don't be retarded. Every firefight involves a certain risk of being injured or killed. Plus you don't want to have to deal with a bunch of nigger corpses on your driveway. There is no "loot" that would make it worth it painting a target on your back. They aren't going to come steal shit from you wearing diamond rings.

>>a4bd8e34-7abb-44a4-b6bf-8361ef77f834
>That's just not true, solar panels can last decades.
Sure, outputting 5% of their original power output.

>>a0b6ae9f-5980-4242-a8cc-812e22eb8771
Well, I stand corrected then. I was just going by what I've heard elsewhere.
Edit: you still have to worry about the batteries though. Maybe I got the two mixed up.
